1.title: The Solemnity of Mary, Mother of God
1.dateNote: If it falls on a Saturday or on a Monday, the precept to attend Mass is abrogated.

15.dateNote: If it falls on a Saturday or on a Monday, the precept to attend Mass is abrogated.

1.dateNote: If it falls on a Saturday or on a Monday, the precept to attend Mass is abrogated.
